levels.description:
Can be <@ba.vup>attacked by allied units</>. After 25 seconds, deals <@ba.vup>{damage}</> <@ba.vup>True</> damage to all allied units within Attack Range and <$ba.stun>Stuns</> them for <@ba.vup>{stun}</> seconds
After being destroyed, view a random selection of <@ba.vup>4</> units from the <@ba.vup>Preparation Area</> and select <@ba.vup>0-1</> units to be removed (will not appear again in this battle) and converted into <@ba.vup>15</> Transfer Permits.
<@ba.rem>After activation, this unit disappears (will not appear again in this battle)</>
